columns.name: JOB_GID
columns.description: The GID for the job.

columns.name: JOB_XID
columns.description: The XID for the job.

columns.name: JOB_QUERY_TYPE
columns.description: Query type options are Order Release or Order Movement. Field is used to identify the order object that you want to associate with the job.

columns.name: JOB_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Job type is based on a pre-defined list of job types that have been defined in the system. Job type is used for informational purposes.

columns.name: CONSOLIDATION_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the consolidation type. Consolidation type can be assigned to a job for informational purposes. Consolidation types can also be included in a consolidation type profile that can then be used as criteria for the automatic assignment of non-freight related charges to a job.

columns.name: IS_MEMO_BL
columns.description: Indicate if the documentation process should create one BL doc for all the shipments in the job. If Y, use MEMO_BL_SHIPMENT_GID to generate the BL.

columns.name: MEMO_BL_SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: Indicate which shipment will be used to generate B/L. This field can not be empty when IS_MEMO_BL is Y.

columns.name: MOVE_PERSPECTIVE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the move perspective. Available options include Import or Export. Move perspective is used to further identify to the type of job. You can predefine additional move perspectives in Power Data.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: CONSOL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the consol. If a job has a consol assigned to it, then this field will hold the unique global identifier of that related consol. A consol is essentially an 'empty shipment' that orders can be booked into.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: Only users with ADMIN status can mark data for purging. Only Database administrators can schedule and run the purge process. Detailed configuration of the purge process takes place when the system is installed. For more information, see your System Administrator.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY1
columns.description: First currency attribute field (currency flex field) to capture the entered currency value of the additional currency information. Data Type NUMBER.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY1_BASE
columns.description: First currency attribute field (currency flex field) to capture the base currency value of the additional currency information. Data Type NUMBER.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY1_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the first currency attribute field. Data Type VARCHAR2(101).

columns.description: Second currency attribute field (currency flex field) to capture the entered currency value of the additional currency information. Data Type NUMBER.
